original: Danielson, Axel Teodor, fd. direktör, Visby, f. 23/3/67 i Älghult, Kro-nob. 1., av Adolf D. o. Emelie Löf-gren. G. 08 m. Hanna Lovisa Svensson. Barn: Axel Torbjörn f. 08. — Mog:ex. 95, med.-fil. stud. s. å. Jour-maliist v;, sv. tidn. ii Amerika 87-91, medarb. i Gotl. Alleh. 91-93, i Sthlms-Tidn. 98, verkst. dir. f. Gotl. Alleh. Tryckeri A-B 99-37, red. o. ansv. utg. 17-37. Led. av stadsfullm. 05-35, fd. ordf. i styr. f. stadsbibi., föreläsn:-fören., arb:fören. o. hantv:fören., fd. v. ordf. i barnkrubban. RVO.
translated: Danielson, Axel Teodor, former director, Visby, born on March 23rd, 1867 in Älghult, Crown land 1, son of Adolf D. and Emelie Löfgren. Married in 1908 to Hanna Lovisa Svensson. Children: Axel Torbjörn, born in 1908. He graduated from the Medical Faculty in 1895 and worked as a journalist in Swedish newspapers in America from 1887-1891. He was also a contributor to the Gotl. Alleh. from 1891-1893, the Sthlms-Tidn. in 1898, and was an executive director of Gotl. Alleh. Tryckeri A-B from 1899-1937. He was also the editor and responsible publisher from 1917-1937. He was a member of the city council from 1905-1935, former chairman of the board for the city library, lecturer for various associations, and was involved in labor and crafts associations. He was former vice-chairman of a daycare center and a recipient of the Order of Vasa.
